name: background-origin
longDescription: For elements rendered as a single box, specifies the background positioning area. For elements rendered as multiple boxes (e.g., inline boxes on several lines, boxes on several pages) specifies which boxes box-decoration-break operates on to determine the background positioning area(s).

values.padding-box: The position is relative to the padding box. (For single boxes 0 0 is the upper left corner of the padding edge, 100% 100% is the lower right corner.)
values.border-box: The position is relative to the border box.
values.content-box: The position is relative to the content box.
